directions: You may use the tables provided to help answer the question below, but you do not need to.

questions.text: Car A has a mass of 200 kg and is moving at a speed of 5 m/s to the right. Car B has a mass of 150 kg and is moving at a speed of 8 m/s to the left. They crash into each other head-on. After they collide, Car A bounces off with a speed of 1 m/s to the left. What does car B do?

answerChoices.text: Car B stops moving
Car B moves at 0.5 m/s to the right
Car B moves at 1.0 m/s to the right
Car B moves at 0.5 m/s to the left
Car B moves at 1.0 m/s to the left

questions.text: Car A has a mass of 100. kg and is moving at a speed of 7 m/s to the right. Car B has a mass of 200. kg and is moving at a speed of 4 m/s to the left. They crash into each other head-on. After they collide, Car A bounces off with a speed of 0.5 m/s to the left. Figure out what car B does:

answerChoices.text: Car B moves at 0.25 m/s to the right.
Car B moves at 0.25 m/s to the left.
Car B moves at 0.75 m/s to the right.
Car B moves at 0.75 m/s to the left.
Car B moves at 1.0 m/s to the right.
Car B moves at 1.0 m/s to the left.
Car B stops moving

questions.text: A truck with a mass of 500. kg is moving at a speed of 10.0 m/s to the right. It smashes into a small car with a mass of 200. kg moving at a speed of 15.0 m/s to the left. After the collision, the car crumbles and sticks to the truck. Determine the final velocity (magnitude and direction) of the car and truck stuck together.

answerChoices.text: 2.86 m/s right
2.34 m/s right
3.12 m/s right
3.59 m/s right
2.86 m/s left
2.34 m/s left
3.12 m/s left
3.59 m/s left

questions.text: A cat drives a bumper car with a mass of 500 kg is moving at 12 m/s. A dog is driving a 600 kg at 10 m/s in the opposite direction. Afterwards, the cat's bumper car bounces backwards with a speed of 15 m/s. Determine the velocity of the dog's bumper car.

answerChoices.text: 12.5 m/s in the original direction of the cat
13.0 m/s in the original direction of the cat
13.5 m/s in the original direction of the cat
14.0 m/s in the original direction of the cat
12.5 m/s in the original direction of the dog
13.0 m/s in the original direction of the dog
13.5 m/s in the original direction of the dog
14.0 m/s in the original direction of the dog
